main event: A military observation recorded a sighting of a white UFO, the size of a silver dollar, blinking in the Pacific on December 7, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and was observed visually from the ground., The object was at an azimuth of 000 degrees and an elevation of 105 degrees., The report speculated the object could be a satellite or meteor., The observation was made under clear visibility conditions with no cloud cover., The reported course of the object was southerly.
sighted object: UFO white size of silver dollar blinking
